trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for an extender control.
trans-unit.target: 对于扩展程序控件提供一个抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> class enables you to programmatically add AJAX functionality to an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>类使你能够以编程方式添加的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的 AJAX 功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl>继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类并实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by all ASP.NET server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类定义属性、 方法和共享的所有 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl> interface is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl>接口是一个抽象类，不能直接实例化。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you create a derived type.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你创建的派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl> 类。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial related to this example, see [Creating an Extender Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55).
trans-unit.target: 与此示例的教程，请参阅[创建扩展程序控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/015b3b49-841a-4cd9-b80c-dfbddfc5be55)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ExtenderControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The server control to which the extender is associated.
trans-unit.target: 与扩展程序相关联的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，为控件注册 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> 对象的枚举。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers the script libraries for the control.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，为控件注册脚本库。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface and that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 接口并包含已注册为嵌入资源的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> event and registers the extender control with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 事件，并将扩展程序脚本控件注册到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the extender control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>引发基类事件时，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>方法注册的扩展程序控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the server control content.
trans-unit.target: 用于接收服务器控件内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, which writes the content to be rendered in the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件内容发送到提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，此对象编写要在浏览器窗口中呈现的内容。

trans-unit.source: The server control that the extender is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 与扩展程序相关联的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Registers the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件注册 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is a private member and cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是私有成员，无法继承。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface and that contains <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 接口并包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor" /> 对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: Registers the script libraries for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件注册脚本库。

trans-unit.source: This method is a private member and cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是私有成员，无法继承。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface and that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 接口并包含已注册为嵌入资源的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the control that the extender is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与扩展程序相关联的控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the server control that is being extended.
trans-unit.target: 要扩展的服务器控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> property to prevent setting this value.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible" /> 属性可以禁止设置此值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the extender control is rendered on the page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在页上呈现扩展程序控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
